Local-first MCP server that automatically detects, diagnoses, and fixes broken code—whether recently committed or legacy. Workflow: Detect → Read → Analyze → Fix → Verify → Ship. Powered by 13 MCP tools, IBM Granite, and a Python FastMCP server; identifies root causes and suggests fixes in under 10 seconds at any codebase size. All code is processed locally until you push.
